ProjectTemplate.Name: React App (Grunt)
ProjectTemplate.Description: React App. This template includes the use of NPM, Bower, Grunt, Gulp and Karma to support the development of your ReactJS application.

ProjectTemplate.Name: React App (Gulp)
ProjectTemplate.Description: React App (Gulp). This template includes the use of NPM and Gulp to support the development of your ReactJS application.

ProjectTemplate.Name: React Desktop Apps (Beta)
ProjectTemplate.Description: React application with additional projects to produce; a CefSharp based WinForms application, Self host console application and Web application ready to deploy to IIS using preconfigured Grunt/Gulp tasks.
